markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Catfolk Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=1268) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Catfolk Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1255)

</column>

---

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all weapons you are trained in from Catfolk Weapon Familiarity.
name: Catfolk Weapon Expertise
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<additional-info>

**Prerequisites**
[Catfolk Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1255)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You are well-trained in traditional catfolk weapons
</summary>
summary: You are well-trained in traditional catfolk weapons
